mapper.select: SELECT i.item_id , i.item_name , i.item_description , i.item_price , c.category_name AS item_category , i.item_rarity , i.is_available , i.created_at , img.image_url , img.image_description FROM tb_items i LEFT JOIN tb_item_images img ON i.item_id = img.item_id LEFT JOIN tb_item_categories c ON i.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name = #{item_category} ORDER BY i.item_price ASC;
SELECT item_price , is_available FROM tb_items WHERE item_id = #{item_id};
